title: fix: use shared OVHCLOUD_API_KEY for Mistral endpoint
author: voodoohop

gist.headline: Mistral finds the right key
gist.blurb: We've polished up the authentication for our Mistral models. The hive is buzzing smoothly again!
gist.summary: Updated the Mistral endpoint configuration to use the correct shared OVHcloud authentication key.
gist.impact: Restores and stabilizes access to Mistral text generation models for all users.
gist.visual_concept: A pixel art bee holding a golden key, standing next to a stylized server or cloud labeled 'Mistral'. The key represents the correct API key being applied.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a cute 8-bit bee mascot holding a large golden pixel key next to a soft blue cloud server. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful.
